greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle whose rows are the sorted combined parts of all strict integer partitions of n.
example: The strict integer partitions of 6 are {(6), (5,1), (4,2), (3,2,1)} with multiset union {1,1,2,2,3,4,5,6}, which is row n = 6.
xref: Run-lengths of row n are row n of A325513.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 08 2019
